description: This sweet little angel got in serious trouble when he tried to pay back a debt to his friend. I respected his honesty but the decision to borrow from a lending company was just plain stupid. This is wild east, you can´t really trust people. So, a young cute boy who was 25 000 Crowns in debt. An ideal candidate for my re-financing magic. He wasn´t the easiest guy to convince but I was determined to see his muscular body. I could tell he spent some time in a gym, which made me incredibly horny. The combination of an innocent face and a fit shaved body was exactly what I was hoping for. With a proper guidance, he even managed to give me a very pleasant oral foreplay. I tried to be gentle but his ass was simply too tight.
title: Debt Dandy 137
